item.title: Werewolf vs. Vampyre
item.description: I had read with mild amusement the minor dustup over the craze of Werewolf players at RubyConf 2007. If you don’t know what it is, you can read about it here. Some people just really enjoy playing social games. Let’s call them the Werewolves… you know who you are, even if the rest of us do not. Other people, however, view RubyConf as a place to get together with the other commiters on their beloved project, stay up all night, and crank out a new release before their presentation the next day.
